name: CoOp Puzzle Platformer
description:
A short learning exercise on implementing multiplayer in UE4 using exclusively c++

Objective is that both players reach the cake platform by working together in activating movable platforms while trying to stay out of the rising lava

Instructions:

Player1 : Click "Host" to start a new game

Player2: Click "Join", input Player1's IP address and click Connect

Should the IP  address be incorrect, nothing should happen, so try again with the proper IP
